title: New logo perfil d'alma
content:
Hi all!

I'm starting to develop a new logo for a new (small) company for training in psychology. In English "perfil d'alma" its "soul profile".  
I dont like very much the result, but...its the owner idea (she likes it!).  
My post here is more a typhographic question. The letters are not a typeface but draw from a typeface found on a old book see [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023232838/http:/typophile.com/node/42228).  
What do you think about it? Good shapes, kerning/spacing?  
Any comments apreaciated.  
Thanks in advanced.

António

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023232838im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_4805.png)
author: afonseca1974
